metadata.synopsis: Karlach is waiting for everyone to go to sleep to start the ROM dialog. She's feeling happy and lighthearted and is humming a song for the first time in the game. This is quietly, to herself, doesn't have to be belted, she's just entertaining herself happily.
metadata.how_to_trigger: (Not implemented yet)1. Load SCL_Main_A and recruit companion Karlach.2. Pre-partner her.3. Unlock her second upgrade.4. Start long rest.
